dialogue.messageText: It’s like flooding outside! What happened to the weather report? I thought this depression was supposed to pass.

dialogue.answerText: Yeah, we all thought so too. That’s what I read online this morning. I missed my office for this too.

dialogue.messageText: I guess a thunderstorm is on its way too.

dialogue.answerText: Can we go inside? I am already half wet!

dialogue.messageText: Hey! How did your English test go?

dialogue.answerText: Not really bad, thanks. I’m just glad that all the exams are over! How about you …how’d your practical examination go?

dialogue.messageText: Oh, it went really well. I can’t thank you enough for helping me with it! I owe you a treat for that.

dialogue.answerText: It’s my pleasure. So … Do you feel like preparing a bit for the React exam scheduled for next week?

dialogue.messageText: Yeah, sure! Meet me at the library after 7 then?

dialogue.answerText: All right. I’ll bring my notes too then.

dialogue.messageText: Sure. See you then. Bye.
Hey, how have you been? Long time no see!

dialogue.answerText: Hey! What a surprise! Yes, you are right, we haven’t seen each other in a long time. How have you been?

dialogue.messageText: There is an important campaign next week which is keeping me busy otherwise rest is going good in my life. How about you?

dialogue.answerText: Oh! I just finished a meeting with a very important client of mine and now I finally have some free time. I feel relieved that I’m done with it.

dialogue.messageText: Good for you then. Hey! Let’s make a plan and catch up with each other after next week. What do you say?

dialogue.answerText: Sure, why not? Give me a call when you are done with your project.

dialogue.messageText: Sure, then. Bye, take care.
Hi! How are you? What are your plans for today?

dialogue.answerText: Oh, hi! I was just thinking about giving you a call. Well, I am free today, what about you?

dialogue.messageText: That’s nice. I was wondering if you’d like to go to a dinner party tonight

dialogue.answerText: Sure, I’d love to! Where is the party?

dialogue.messageText: It’s in the Park Hotel?
Ok I’ll pick you up around 8:30. We will probably reach the hall by 9 p.m.
I just bought a ticket to New York City. I’m so excited to see the city!

dialogue.answerText: Good for you! Traveling is so much fun. I love discovering new places and new people. When are you leaving?

dialogue.messageText: Next week. I’m taking the red eye. It was cheaper. Hopefully, I’ll be able to sleep on the plane.

dialogue.answerText: I wish I could go with you! New York City is a magical place. You will have so much fun.

dialogue.messageText: I hope so. I’m going to visit my brother who lives there. I will stay for a week and then take the train down to Washington, D.C.

dialogue.answerText: That sounds like a great vacation. I’m looking forward to a week at the beach for my summer vacation. I just want to relax.

dialogue.messageText: Thanks for meeting with me during your lunch hour. I appreciate it.

dialogue.answerText: No problem. I’m happy to help. What’s going on?

dialogue.messageText: Oh you know, the usual. Should I take this new job? Or do I stick with my current one?

dialogue.answerText: Well, I think it’s time for a change, don’t you? They pay you late and you are unhappy.

dialogue.messageText: Do you really think so?

dialogue.answerText: I know so. And I’ve been listening to you complain for over a year now. Trust me. Take the job. What do you have to lose?
